desc: 防御力・最大ＨＰを３０％アップし、すべての状態異常を無効化する

dictionary.lore: A demon pike that belonged to Lance, one of the Six Heroes. This pike originated from the Vriksha Duchy and is said to bestow its user with the power of nature. However, it bears a curse that completely fuses the pike to its user over time. It is rumored that Lance could hear the voice of the demon pike, but there are various theories as to what the pike told him.

name: 魔槍ドレヴァス
